text: Qasseka Xoossa immotay issade baggara yida nagarappe beettida ayife mala gidenna. Gaasoykka iza piriday issade nagara kaallid pirida ekki yides. Iza immotay qase daro qoho geedon xiilloteth ehides. Hayqoy hayssade baggara kawotidayssa gidikko daro tiripa gidida Xoossa kiyatethinne xiillotetha immota ekkidayti issade baggara hessika Yesusi kiristoosa baggara xoonidi deyon daana.
